articles.title: More Meetings Held to Hail Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
More Meetings Held to Hail Successful Nuclear Test
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in the capitals of South Phyongan, Jagang, South Hwanghae, North Hwanghae and Kangwon Provinces to hail the second successful nuclear test.
					 Present there were leading officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations and servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people of different circles and youth and students. 
					
					 Speakers at the meetings said that the above-said success marked a historic event which demonstrated the dignity and might of Songun Korea to the world once again. 
					
					 The recent nuclear test was a great courageous action to protect the supreme interests of the Republic and defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation under the situation in which the U.S. imperialists have become evermore undisguised in their moves to threat the DPRK with a preemptive nuclear strike at it and tighten sanctions and increase pressure upon it, they said, extending warm congratulations and salute to the scientists and technicians who successfully carried out the nuclear test with their wisdom and technology. 
					
					 They stressed that the successful nuclear test greatly encouraged the Korean people in their dynamic drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge and dealt telling blows at the U.S. imperialists and their followers keen to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 The speakers underscored the need to adorn every day of the 150-day campaign with miracles and feats, highly proud and honored with the status of the country as a nuclear weapons state and open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Smoking Decreases in DPRK
articles.content:
Smoking Decreases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Smoking is on the decrease in the DPRK.
					 Hong Sun Gwang, a vice-director of the State Hygienic Control Board, had an interview with KCNA on the occasion of the World No Tobacco Day (May 31).
					
					 Question: The number of non-smokers is increasing in the country as days go by, I think.
					
					 Answer: Yes, it is. Our country signed the Framework Convention on Tobacco Control presented by the WHO in June Juche 92 (2003) and has launched an anti-smoking campaign consistently. As a result, the smoking rate decreased to 54.7 percent among the smokers.
					
					 Q: Would you tell me about the reason?
					
					 A: It is thanks to the efforts of the DPRK government that set a goal of decreasing the smoking rate to 30 percent by 2010 and has directed greater attention to the campaign.
					
					 The government, above all, provided the legal environment for lowering the smoking rate. On this basis, it has consistently conducted the anti-smoking campaign such as establishing smoking order, controlling the disorderly smokers by the method of education and strictly banning all kinds of advertisement of and support to the tobacco goods.
					
					 In order to convert the campaign into a state hygienic activity, the government organized a committee to control smoking and took positive measures to raise its role.
					
					 A tobacco-quitting goods exhibition has been set up. It provides tobacco-quitting goods, tonics and consultation to those who intend to give up smoking, thus paying off profusely.
					
					 Anti-smoking propaganda activities have been vigorously conducted in various forms and methods, with the result that smokers are abstaining from smoking on their own accord, boys in their minority do not start smoking and a social control atmosphere has been created.
					
					 Q: What is the theme for the World No Tobacco Day this year?
					
					 A: We are going to organize functions on the day in accordance with the theme "Tobacco Health Warnings".
					
					 On the occasion of the day, anti-smoking propaganda activities on the theme are vigorously conducted at the provincial hygienic propaganda halls and non-smoking signs are put up in public health and educational institutions and public places.

articles.title: Lofty Life of Ri Po Ik, Ardent Patriot
articles.content:
Lofty Life of Ri Po Ik, Ardent Patriot
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean people with deep reverence are recollecting the life of Ri Po Ik, an ardent patriot, which is replete with firm revolutionary spirit and lofty patriotism, on the occasion of her birth anniversary (May 31, 1876).
					She lived a stout and upright life as the mother and grandmother of great revolutionaries.
					
					One spring day of 1911 Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, entered the Sungsil Middle School.
					
					It was difficult for the poor Mangyongdae family, which could hardly afford enough uncleaned sorghum gruel, to send its son to the middle school.
					
					His father Kim Po Hyon and his mother Ri Po Ik did farming day and night to make the monthly tuition fee for him.
					
					She let her son, whom she had brought up with so much effort, struggle to win back the country ruined by the Japanese imperialists without living together.
					
					After his son passed away while waging the revolutionary activities for the independence of the country, she said to President Kim Il Sung as follows:
					
					"You will have to take over the burden your father was carrying now. You must pick up the cause where he left off and win back the country, come what may. You may have no chance to take care of me or your mother, as is your filial duty, but you must give yourself heart and soul to the cause of Korea's independence."
					
					The President was deeply moved and encouraged by her words.
					
					Though she would like to live together with her sturdy sons and grandsons under the same roof in the ruined country, she made no scruple to send out even her young grandson for the revolution.
					
					The Japanese imperialists resorted to every conceivable means to make the President "submit" through her during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, but to no avail.
					
					It was her lofty spiritual world that a family cannot exist without the motherland and to devote all to the motherland is precisely the way for the parents.
					
					Although she was grandmother to the head of a state after the liberation of the country, she did not want luxury bestowed on her and led a life as plain, ordinary people.
					
					Indeed, the whole life of Ri Po Ik is an extremely noble one shining with love of the country and people.

articles.title: Immortal Exploits of Kim Il Sung for Building of Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Immortal Exploits of Kim Il Sung for Building of Revolutionary Party
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are looking back, with deep emotion, upon the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the cause of building a Juche-oriented revolutionary Party on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of the publication of his famous work "The Historical Experience of Building the Workers' Party of Korea" (May 31, 1986).
					 He, taking the party building as a fundamental matter on which depends the victory of the revolution from the early years of his revolutionary activities, had blazed a trail for party building in an original way and consolidated the WPK as an organizational and ideological integral whole in which a monolithic ideological system was firmly established.
					
					 He paid a primary attention to the work for imbuing the whole Party with one ideology and realizing organizational unity while leading the party building.
					
					 His idea of party building is embodied in the WPK's activities for rejecting dogmatism and flunkeyism and applying the Juche idea fully to the revolution and construction, and in the effort of the WPK for strengthening the organizational unity against all the factional elements.
					
					 It is just the WPK that the whole Party is armed with one ideology, the revolutionary idea of the President, and is united firmly with one ideology and one purpose on the basis of it.
					
					 The President put forth the line of building a mass Party and developed the WPK to be an invincible one which has its root deep into masses.
					
					 The President saw to it that a hammer, a sickle and a writing brush symbolizing the workers, peasants and intellectuals were inscribed in the Party's emblem. He also led the Party to form a harmonious whole with the popular masses and to faithfully serve them.
					
					 He set it forth to defend the interests of the people as the overriding principle of the Party's activities and let all the Party members go deep among the masses with revolutionary mass viewpoint.
					
					 The President made every possible effort to raise the leading role of the WPK so as to make uninterrupted leap-forward and renovation in the socialist construction.
					
					 He saw it to apply the revolutionary method and popular style of work established during the anti-Japanese struggle to the party work and activity, and created the Chongsan-ri spirit, the Chongsan-ri method and the Taean work system so that the officials made a radical change in their attitude toward work.
					
					 His revolutionary party work system and method including the issue of solving the difficult problems by giving precedence to the political work and stimulating people ideologically are the main factor that enables the Party's leadership over the socialist construction to display inexhaustible vitality.
					
					 The WPK, with the rich exploits and experience for party building established by the President, will demonstrate its dignity and might all over the world as a revolutionary Party of Juche type, an invincible Party.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Military Adventures Termed Dangerous
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Military Adventures Termed Dangerous
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Koran warmongers would be well advised to stop going reckless, clearly mindful that their reckless military moves against the DPRK will precipitate their own self-destruction. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday warns this in a signed article:
					
					 The U.S. military and the south Korean puppet warmongers are getting evermore undisguised in their moves to render the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense in a bid to ignite the second Korean war. This is clearly evidenced by the fact that they are persistently resorting to the dangerous military adventures to put the DPRK-targeted "OPLAN 5027" and "OPLAN 5029" into practice. 
					
					 Such military adventures that can be seen only on the eve of a war go to evidently prove that they are waiting for an opportunity to start a nuclear war after having rounded off the preparations for an offensive operation to seize the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 A war has not broken out and peace has been preserved on the Korean Peninsula which has been exposed to constant danger of a war. This is entirely thanks to the DRPK war deterrent for self-defense. The situation prevailing in Korea due to the frantic moves of the bellicose forces in and outside south Korea to ignite a war against the DPRK requires its people to grasp once again the truth that it is necessary to bolster up the might of Songun in every way in order to defend the dignity of the nation and the peace of the country and prevent a war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets' escalated moves for confrontation and war against the DPRK are a vicious provocation to the DPRK that has made efforts for lasting peace on the peninsula. 
					
					 The DPRK wants peace, but is never afraid of a war. It is the revolutionary principle and spirit of the DPRK and its action method to return fire for fire and counter a hard-line with the toughest stand. 
					
					 The DPRK will deal decisive and merciless blows at the enemies who desperately run amuck to dare preempt an attack on it in infringement upon its sovereignty and dignity. Anyone seeking to intrude into the DPRK will never be able to go scot-free.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Full Participation in PSI Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Full Participation in PSI Flailed
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Papers Saturday in signed commentaries denounce the south Korean puppet warmongers for officially announcing their full participation in the PSI a few days ago, pursuant to the U.S. and its followers' anti-DPRK racket.
					 Rodong Sinmun asserts that the announcement is, in essence, an undisguised declaration of a war against the DPRK as it is a rash act of disclosing the criminal scenario of the confrontation and war fanatics and an open expression of their stand to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost in line with the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The paper brands the Lee Myung Bak group's full participation in the PSI as a serious encroachment upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and a declaration for a war against peace as it is aimed to provoke the second Korean war any moment after wrecking peace on the Korean Peninsula and a despicable treacherous and anti-reunification act of bringing the north-south relations to total collapse. 
					
					 Saying that the group is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can apply the U.S. style logic guided by the law of jungle against the DPRK, the paper goes on:
					
					 It is our mode of counteraction to respond to rifle firing by the U.S. imperialists and the group of traitors with artillery firing and beat back their preemptive attack with strong retaliatory blows. It is our mode of strike to neutralize the hostile forces' military muscle with unimaginable means strong enough to shake the earth.
					
					 The Lee group of warmongers' full participation in the PSI would only serve as a catalyst precipitating its miserable end.
					
					 Minju Joson warns that should the group of traitors keep to the road of confrontation with fellow countrymen it will never be able to escape merciless punishment.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Full Participation in PSI Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Full Participation in PSI Condemned in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- South Korean opposition parties and organizations denounced the reckless action taken by the puppet authorities to officially announce south Korea's full participation in the PSI.
					 A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party, when interviewed at the "National Assembly" on May 26, termed the Lee Myung Bak "government's" full participation in the PSI a dangerous act of bringing dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 If the Lee "government" truly does not want a military conflict, it should retract the decision to fully participate in the PSI at once, he urged.
					
					 A spokesman for the Democratic Party on the same day declared that it has no option but to chide the "government" authorities for its reckless stand of taking an unnecessary step to fully participate in the PSI which has proved ineffective.
					
					 The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea released a statement that day denouncing the Lee "government's" official announcement of the full participation in the PSI as a very dangerous act of driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula into a military conflict.
					
					 Organizations of the anti-war, peace movement of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a press conference in front of the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade on May 27 at which they condemned the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for sparking off a military conflict between the north and the south through the full participation in the PSI.
					
					 A press release read out at the press conference said that the authorities' reckless action is an undisguised declaration of their intention to block the way of improving the inter-Korean relations and persistently pursue the confrontation with fellow countrymen. It demanded an immediate withdrawal of the dangerous full participation of the PSI.

articles.title: Korean People Urged to Display Same Fighting Spirit as Done in Period of Great Chollima Surge
articles.content:
Korean People Urged to Display Same Fighting Spirit as Done in Period of Great Chollima Surge
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- All the people should live and struggle in the same fighting spirit as displayed in the period of the great Chollima surge. Herein lies a sure guarantee for achieving a shining victory in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 The new great revolutionary surge is being vigorously effected throughout the country and the 150-day campaign is brisk on all fronts of the socialist construction. Under this situation the Workers' Party of Korea is requesting all the people to live and work in the same spirit as displayed in the period of the great Chollima surge, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The spirit of absolutely and unconditionally carrying out the party's line and policy, the ardent patriotic zeal to glorify the country as a dignified and prosperous socialist country and the indomitable fighting spirit to bravely overcome whatever difficulties by one's own efforts highly displayed in the said period serve as a good example to be followed by the people who are out in the general advance for the ultimate victory of the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The noble spirit of regarding the party's line and policy as one's life and soul and the do-or-die spirit of unhesitatingly going through thick and thin to carry out the tasks given to them by the party find a vivid manifestation in the ranks of the people making a general advance.
					
					 The fighting spirit displayed in the period of the great Chollima surge serves as a precious example encouraging all the people to highly display the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance in the present general advance and a powerful engine that helps effect vigorous collective innovations throughout the country.
					
					 It is strong national self-esteem and unshakable will of the Korean people to eternally glorify the history of building a rich and powerful country, a history that started and has made a steady advance thanks to the spirit of self-reliance, with the might of the same spirit.
					
					 There are no difficulties insurmountable and no fortresses unconquerable because all the people live and struggle in the same spirit as displayed in the period of the great Chollima surge, cherishing the spirit of self-reliance as a treasured sword for winning all victories. 
					
					 It is thanks to the collective innovation drive that the single-minded unity of our revolutionary ranks has remarkably grown strong and popular heroism become a powerful engine dynamically propelling the era and a source of world-startling miracles and feats.
					
					 All the people are displaying the spirit of self-reliance by their concerted efforts and scaling the high eminence of the modernization of the national economy through a mass technical innovation drive. This is the true picture of the DPRK replete with the fighting spirit displayed in the period of the great Chollima surge.

articles.title: Youth and Students Called upon to Take Lead in Anti- "Government" Struggle
articles.content:
Youth and Students Called upon to Take Lead in Anti- "Government" Struggle
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils released a manifesto on May 27 calling upon the youth and students to take the lead in the struggle, holding aloft the slogans "Lee Myung Bak regime, step down! Disorganize Myung Bak's prosecution! Protect democracy!"
					 The manifesto accused Lee of having resorted to the wholesale crackdown upon organizations and opposition figures calling for progress, reforms and democracy while talking about the "lost decade" as soon as he came to power. 
					
					 It charged that the era of fascist dictatorship has arrived at south Korea again in less than one year of Lee's office. 
					
					 Recalling that those who benefit from the Lee regime are only a tiny handful of plutocrats and privileged circles, the manifesto deplored that how many more people are fated to meet deaths under the present regime in south Korea which is represented by Lee and his servants keen on the fascist dictatorship and which allows police to burn inhabitants to death and "the Grand National Party" to ride roughshod and the prosecution to conduct excessive coercive investigation.
					
					 One can never remain a passive onlooker to the corrupt reality today, the manifesto noted, appealing to all the youth and students to devote the spirit and enthusiasm of the young people to the struggle for judging the Lee regime.

articles.title: Periodicos condenan participacion total del Sur de Corea en la PSI
articles.content:
Periodicos condenan participacion total del Sur de Corea en la PSI
 Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos denunciaron en sendos comentarios individuales difundidos este sabado a los belicistas titeres surcoreanos que anunciaron oficialmente hace unos dias la participacion total en la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion (PSI en ingles)" adhiriendose a la campana de Estados Unidos y sus satelites contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Esa locura muestra el intento criminal de los maniacos de guerra y confrontacion y significa abierta declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC, critica el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					 Especificamente, constituye la exposicion de la posicion de desatar a toda costa la guerra de agresion a la RPDC sumandose a la politica hostil a esta de EE.UU.
					
					  El ingreso de la banda de Lee Myung Bak en la PSI deviene el grave atentado a la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC, la declaracion para destruir la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y provocar la segunda guerra coreana en cualquier momento y una locura antinacional y anti-reunificacion que llevo las relaciones N-S a la ruptura total.
					
					 Esta muy equivocada la banda de Lee que intenta aplicar a la RPDC esa logica de EE.UU. basada en la ley de selva.
					
					 Responder con el canon al fusil y con rafagas al primer disparo de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos es el modo de enfrentamiento al estilo coreano.
					
					 Y nuestro modo de golpe consiste en aniquilar a las fuerzas armadas hostiles con el medio con efectos inimaginables y capaces de sacudir todo el planeta.
					
					  La participacion total de esa horda belicista en la PSI es el catalizador que adelantara su vergonzoso fin.
					
					 El periodico Minju Joson subraya que si la banda de Lee Myung Bak sigue emprendiendo el camino de confrontacion fratricida, sera condenado al castigo implacable.

articles.title: Continuan mitines congratulatorios del exito de segunda prueba nuclear
articles.content:
Continuan mitines congratulatorios del exito de segunda prueba nuclear
 Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar los mitines congratulatorios del exito de la segunda prueba nuclear en las cabeceras de las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, de Jagang, de Hwanghae del Sur y del Norte y de Kangwon.
					  A las ocasiones asistieron los cuadros de los organos del partido, el poder y las organizaciones de masas de esas localidades, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  Los oradores senalaron que el exito de la segunda prueba nuclear es un evento historico que manifesto otra vez a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					  Dado que se recrudecen cada vez mas la amenaza de ataque preventivo nuclear, la sancion y la presion de los imperialistas norteamericanos, la citada prueba nuclear es un gran suceso para defender el interes supremo, la dignidad y la soberania del pais y la nacion, subrayaron y enviaron calidas felicitaciones y saludo a los cientificos y tecnicos quienes la ejecutaron con exito usando la inteligencia y la tecnologia nacionales.
					
					  Destacaron que tal exito devino un gran estimulo al pueblo coreano, que da grandes pasos del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario, y un golpe duro para EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites que actuan demencialmente para aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					  Llamaron a todos a coronar todo el curso de la batalla de 150 dias con el milagro y las proezas enorgulleciendose de ser pais provisto de armas nucleares para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en 2012 en que se celebrara el centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: FCGEUS llama a la juventud surcoreana a lucha contra gobierno
articles.content:
FCGEUS llama a la juventud surcoreana a lucha contra gobierno
Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- La Direccion de Lucha del 17o periodo de la "Federacion de Consejos Generales de Estudiantes Universitarios del Sur de Corea" publico el dia 27 una proclama llamando a los jovenes y estudiantes a estar al frente de la lucha levantando en alto la consigna de "!Que se retire el poder de Lee Myung Bak!, !Disolvamos la fiscalia de MB (Myung Bak)!, !Defendamos la democratizacion!"
					  El documento revela que desde su llegada al poder, Lee vino reprimiendo brutalmente a las entidades y las personalidades de oposicion, que reclaman el progreso, la reforma y la democracia, hablando tanto de los "10 anos perdidos".
					
					  Precisa que a menos de un ano de su mandato, fue retornado en el suelo surcoreano el periodo de la dictadura fascista.  
					
					 En el "regimen" de Lee existe solo un punado de plutocratas y privilegiados, senala.
					
					 Cuantos hombres mas moriran en el actual "regimen" en que Lee y sus lacayos estan enfrascados en la dictadura fascista, la policia mata quemando a los habitantes, el "Gran Partido Nacional" actua arbitrariamente y la fiscalia realiza la investigacion excesivamente impactante, se pregunto.
					
					  No podemos estar con brazos cruzados ante la corrupta realidad de hoy, enfatiza y llama a los jovenes y estudiantes que dediquen todo el impetu y pasion de la juventud a la lucha por enjuiciar al "poder" de Lee.

articles.title: Crece en Sur de Corea el rechazo a la participacion total en la "PSI"
articles.content:
Crece en Sur de Corea el rechazo a la participacion total en la "PSI"
Pyongyang, 30 de mayo (ATCC) -- Los partidos opositores y las entidades del Sur de Corea condenaron la locura de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas que publicaron oficialmente la participacion total en la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" (PSI).
					  En la entrevista de prensa concedida el dia 26 en la "Asamblea Nacional", el portavoz del "Partido de Obreros Democraticos" califico de acto peligroso para provocar la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana la participacion total en la "PSI" del "gobierno" de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Si el "gobierno" de Lee no desea de veras el choque armado, debera revocar ahora mismo esa decision, exigio.
					
					  Ese dia, el portavoz del "Partido Democratico" dijo que merece ser condenada la imprudencia de las autoridades del "gobierno" que tomaron esa innecesaria e ineficiente medida: la participacion total en la "PSI".
					
					  El mismo dia, la "Solidaridad por el Progreso del Sur de Corea" condeno en su declaracion al "gobierno" de Lee calificando tal anuncio oficial de acto sumamente peligroso para llevar al choque armado la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  En la rueda de prensa ofrecida el dia 27 frente al "Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y Comercio", las entidades del movimiento por la paz y contra la guerra como los "Hombres Partidarios de la Paz y Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea condenaron a la camarilla del traidor Lee que busca el choque militar intercoreano con la medida referida.
					
					  La nota de entrevista leida en la ocasion indica que la nueva locura de las autoridades es la declaracion abierta de que cerrarian las posibilidades de mejorar las relaciones N-S y perseguirian continuamente la confrontacion fratricida, y demanda la cancelacion inmediata de esa peligrosisima medida.
